## Point.intField() method

Adds an integer field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
intField(name: string, value: number | any): Point;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | field name |
|  value | number \| any | field value |

**Returns:**

[Point](./influxdb3-client.point.md)

## Exceptions

NaN or out of int64 range value is supplied
